description: This file defines utility functions, macros, and constants for ASN.1 encoding/decoding operations, including type checks, buffer manipulation, file I/O, and cryptographic fingerprinting. It appears to be a header file for ASN.1 utilities used in ASN.1 encoded data processing within a broader software system.
external_files: other headers or source files related to ASN.1 and cryptographic operations
external_methods: BOOLEAN GetVisibleStringFromBMPString(PUCHAR pUData, ULONG length, PCHAR pBuffer, PULONG pNewLength)
PUCHAR ASN1CreateTLV(UCHAR uTag, ULONG length, PUCHAR pData, PULONG pNewLength)
BOOL ASN1WriteBinaryToFile(PCHAR pFileName, PUCHAR pEncoding, ULONG length)

methods.name: IsObjectChoiceType
methods.description: Checks if the given ASN.1 type is an object choice type.

methods.name: ASN1Type2String
methods.description: Converts ASN.1 type identifier to its string representation.

methods.name: GetVisibleStringFromBMPString
methods.description: Converts a BMPString to a visible string.

methods.name: ASN1CreateTLV
methods.description: Creates an ASN.1 encoded TLV (Tag-Length-Value) object with specified tag and data.

methods.name: ASN1WriteBinaryToFile
methods.description: Writes the binary ASN.1 encoded data to a file for debugging or storage.

methods.name: PKIInitDHKeyParameter
methods.description: Initializes Diffie-Hellman key parameters with specified length.

methods.name: PKIIsDHParameterAcceptable
methods.description: Checks if the given DH parameter conforms to acceptable Oakley groups.
